code: import axiosInstance from'./axios';export const getAllProducts=async()=>{const response=await axiosInstance.get('/products');return response.data;};export const getProductById=async id=>{const response=await axiosInstance.get("/products/".concat(id));return response.data;};export const addProduct=async product=>{const response=await axiosInstance.post('/products',product);return response.data;};export const updateProduct=async(id,product)=>{const response=await axiosInstance.put("/products/".concat(id),product);return response.data;};export const deleteProduct=async id=>{const response=await axiosInstance.delete("/products/".concat(id));return response.data;};
